34 void ROSNode::odomCallBack(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr &msg){ //Type: nav_msgs/Odometry
35  // robotMtx_.lock();
36  bot_odom = *msg;
37 
38  //Testing sendGoal
39  nav_msgs::Odometry newODOM = bot_odom;
40  newODOM.pose.pose.position.x += 0.5;
41  newODOM.pose.pose.position.y += 0.5;
42 
43  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped goal;
44  goal.pose.position = newODOM.pose.pose.position;
45  goal.pose.orientation.w = 1;
46  goal.header.frame_id = "map";
47 
48  sendGoal(goal);
49  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(10));
50  // robotMtx_.unlock();
51 }
52 void ROSNode::cameraCallBack(const sensor_msgs::LaserScanConstPtr &msg){ // Type: sensor_msgs/Image
53  robotMtx_.lock();
54  camera_ = *msg;
55  robotMtx_.unlock();
56 }
